attributes.action: Prevent the BBC wasting taxpayers money on screening Formula One motorsport from next year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This so called sport is now no longer any more than a corrupt pantomime.  Given that its only aim is to promote the Italian Motor industry we should not be spending taxpayers money on such a farce

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
